entries.description: Add "Copy S3 URI" to S3 objects (#2208)
Add option to view past object versions in S3 file editor
Re-add environment variable settings to SAM template based run configurations (#2282)
Fix error thrown on profile refresh if removing a profile that uses source_profile (#2309)
Fix NodeJS and Python breakpoints failing to hit sometimes
Fix not invalidating credentials when a `source_profile` is updated
Fix cell based copying in CloudWatch Logs (#2333)
Fix certain S3 buckets being unable to be shown in the explorer (#2342)
Fix exception thrown in the new project wizard when run immediately after the toolkit is installed
Fixing issue with SSO refresh locking UI thread (#2224)
